segments.text: Hi , dear , I've got your voice at last .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , darling , I am thinking it is the time of your calling .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Quite good except thinking of you so much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So do I . You are a beautiful flower in my mind .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's called love is blind , I think .
segments.speaker: S2
